title: Microsoft Edge is getting a built-in VPN powered by Cloudflare
content:
Microsoft is testing a VPN-like service for its Edge browser, adding a new layer of security and privacy to the browsing experience. A recently-discovered support page on Microsoft’s website details the “Microsoft Edge Secure Network” feature, which provides data encryption and prevents online tracking, courtesy of Cloudflare. While it isn’t available yet, even if you

The post Microsoft Edge is getting a built-in VPN powered by Cloudflare appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is readying a Secure Network feature for its Edge browser, a VPN-like service powered by Cloudflare, providing extra security.
